items.value: Bob wants a friend and needs help!
You can be my friend and i will help you in the future!

Hello my Name is Bob,
would you like to be my best friend?
Since i lost my job and wife, i am looking for people i can trust.
I also would help you survive if you could bring me:

3x Fortune Cookie

It should only serve as a symbolic sign of friendship! * clears throat *
Really? Don't you just want to rob me?

Why should I do that?

I would never steal from you, I bet my last pubic hair!
ok, well i hope so ... where did we stop?
I do not trust you! I prefer to go on ...

I see you have heart and mind!
Take these items and take care of yourself...

Check back soon so that our friendship will last.
Maybe I will also find great things for you!

You got: 1x A man of the streets (Vol.1), 1x Vegetable Soup
thank you buddy! see ya soon...

You dont have 3x Fortune Cookie with you!
please come back as soon you got them...

It should only serve as a symbolic sign of friendship! * clears throat *
